#summary Get the number of unread items in the feed

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_user


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||required||jabberId||jid||Jabber ID of the user whose feed is being requested.||
</table>


==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
||*Code*||*Exception*||*Description*||
||401||UnauthorizedAccessException||You cannot access the feed of user {USERID}.||
</table>

          <unreadCount>1</unreadCount>
     </getFeedUnreadCount>
     <serverInformation>

          <name>sandbox.tokbox.com</name>
          <userAgent>N/A</userAgent>
          <remoteAddress>76.74.154.35</remoteAddress>
          <requestURI>/feed/unreadCount</requestURI>
     </serverInformation>
     <partner key="###"/>
     <timer startTime="1217971738.4812" execTime="26.880979537964"/>
</tokResult>
